content:
# The attempt to harvest iron ore has failed once again, indicating that I am still unable to reach the resource despite being within the bounding box.
#
# This persistent issue suggests that there might be a need to verify if the iron ore is actually available for harvesting or if there are any other factors preventing access.
#
# I will check the resource availability in the inventory to see if there are any iron ore resources that I can harvest.

# Inspecting the inventory to check for available iron ore resources.
inventory = inspect_inventory()
iron_ore_available = inventory.get(Prototype.IronOre, 0)  # Check the quantity of iron ore in inventory.
print(f"Available Iron Ore in Inventory: {iron_ore_available}")  # Output the amount of iron ore available.
